name: Swiss Cheese
description: Swiss Cheese is a special location and a favorite swimming hole. The water is cold but enjoyable on a hot day. The river flows through a gorge of volcanic bedrock which includes many strange holes and tunnels that resemble the eponymous cheese for which the location is named.

name: McKercher Park
description: A public park that is extrememly popular during warm summer weather. People swim, drift on floaties, and generally enjoy a beautiful peaceful spot on the river.

name: Queens Bend
location: Queen Avenue at west edge of Albany
description: A well-known and well-used location by locals for swimming,sunbathing, floating, and hanging out.

name: Willamette Confluence
description: Accessible from Bryant Park on the west and Montieth Riverfront park on the east, this is the most utilized recreation location on the calapooia river, popular for swimming and paddling.
